name: Plan K - Organic Paleo-Inspired Muscle Gainer

Breakfast.details: Organic Sweet Potato Hash with Eggs: 1 large organic sweet potato (diced), 4 oz organic ground turkey, 2 organic eggs, 1/4 organic avocado, 1 tbsp organic coconut oil, 1 tsp organic herbs (rosemary, thyme)
Breakfast.instructions: Saut√© sweet potato and turkey in coconut oil. Add eggs and cook. Serve with sliced avocado and herbs.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Bone Broth Protein Shake: 1 cup organic bone broth, 1 scoop organic collagen peptides, 1/2 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 tsp organic cinnamon

Lunch.details: Organic Grilled Chicken Salad: 6 oz organic grilled chicken breast, 2 cups organic mixed greens, 1/4 cup organic walnuts, 1/4 cup organic blueberries, 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 tbsp organic balsamic vinegar
Lunch.instructions: Grill chicken. Toss greens with walnuts and blueberries. Top with chicken and dress with olive oil and balsamic.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Turkey and Vegetable Roll-Ups: 4 oz organic turkey slices, 1/4 organic cucumber (sliced), 1/4 organic bell pepper (sliced), 2 tbsp organic guacamole
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Spread guacamole on turkey slices. Add cucumber and bell pepper, then roll up.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein-Packed Smoothie: 1.5 scoops organic egg white protein powder, 1 cup organic coconut milk, 1/2 cup organic frozen strawberries, 1 tbsp organic coconut oil

Dinner.details: Organic Grass-Fed Steak with Vegetables: 8 oz organic grass-fed steak, 1 cup organic roasted Brussels sprouts, 1 organic baked sweet potato, 2 tbsp organic ghee
Dinner.instructions: Grill steak. Roast Brussels sprouts. Bake sweet potato. Top vegetables with ghee.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Mixed Nuts and Berries: 1/4 cup organic mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, cashews), 1/4 cup organic mixed berries
